---

It seems PrettyTables can do this:
```julia> using PrettyTables

julia> data 
Dict{String,Any} with 3 entries:
  "load_mwh"               => "Total power delivered during time interval measured."
  "co2_mass_tons"          => "Carbon dioxide emissions in short tons."
  "operating_datetime_utc" => "Date and time measurement began (UTC)."

julia> pretty_table(data; tf=tf_markdown)
|                   Keys |                                               Values |
|                 String |                                                  Any |
|------------------------|------------------------------------------------------|
|               load_mwh | Total power delivered during time interval measured. |
|          co2_mass_tons |              Carbon dioxide emissions in short tons. |
| operating_datetime_utc |               Date and time measurement began (UTC). |```
